verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lokaana shaashwataananda memiyu Ledani cheppenu priyadesu Ponda vale nee lokamunandu Kontha kaala menno shramalu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aiguptunu vidichi natti meeru Aranya vaasule ee dharalo Nitya nivaasamu ledilalona Netraalu kaanaanupai nilupudi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Maaraanu polina chedaina stalamula Dwaaraa povalasi yunnanemi Nee rakshakundagu Yese nadupunu Maarani thanadu maata nammu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aiguptu aashala nanniyu vidichi Ranguga Yesuni vembadinchi Paadaina korahu paapambu maani Vidheyulai viraajilludi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aananda maya paralokambu manadi Akkada nundi vachchunesu Siyonu geetamu sompuga kalisi Paadedamu prabhu Yesuku jai{/lang-eng}
